summary: A comedy/sci-fi/adventure about three high school kids who invent a 10 minute time machine to spare others just like them from the humiliation they've endured.
cast: Jason Dolley|Luke Benward|Nicholas Braun|Chelsea Kane|Steven R. McQueen|Kara Crane|Dexter Darden|J.P. Manoux|James Jamison|Jason Tatom|Trenton James|Kellie Cockrell|Charlie Fratto|Joe Pitti|Shawn Carter|Damarr Jones|Terence Goodman|Trevor Snarr|Molly Jepson|Roxy Shabestari|Andrew Jay Rindlisbach|Anthony Olson|Irene Santiago|Joshua Edward John Bendoski|Nicholas Hammond|Mitch Hall|William 'Bus' Riley|Skyler Holman|Talon G. Ackerman|Shartel Haywood|Franco Acosta|Angella Joy|Jeremy Kennan|Daniel McGraw|Stephanie Michaud|Madi Millspaugh|Ian Roebuck|Travis Victor Webb|Johnny Ahn|Matthew Miles Carter|Larry Filion|Darren Fromal|Alyx Gaudio|Michael McQuain|Ben Naccarato
title: Minutemen: Viajeros en el tiempo
